title: Didn't get a chest after a teammate got an S on Darius
body:
Last game one of my teamates just got an S on darius, and i havent received a chest with darius this season why didnt i get a chest?
Plus i have full chest slots...
LoL system so rigged.

replies.body: Was the teammate who received an S in a premade with you?  In addition to owning the champion and not having already received one with it, a player in your own premade has to receive an S.  More information is also available thorugh our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions, and which champion this was on!
not premade. I was solo. Its Darius XD

Two things:

1.) If you were solo and not premade, then there's nothing wrong. Random teammates getting an S- or better will not grant you chests. You need to be in a premade party with them.

2.) If someone in your premade gets an S- or better to get you a chest, you get a chest for the champion YOU are playing, not the one they are playing. So even if that teammate was in a premade with you, you weren't the one playing Darius, they were, so it doesn't matter if you haven't earned a chest for Darius yet. What would matter (if you were in a premade) is if you had earned a chest for the champion you were playing at the time.
This could mean that you already got a Hextech chest for that champion. The game isn't rigged.
Never received a chest with Darius the box is grey the ones I earned a chest with are colored in
You get chests for YOUR champion, not the champ your teammate gets an S on. You also have to be playing a normal or ranked game.
II own Darius and it was a normal and it just happened again the guy earned an -s didnt receive one
